Desc.entry: Sessions include: junior, parent and toddler, adult swimming, aqua-fit, GP exercise referral and people with disabilities sessions, childrens swimming lessons, adults swimming lessons, women only, men only, family swim, splash and over 50s sessions. There is also a gymnasium available. Part of Zest is a registerd charity (see separate entry).

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 7.30am-9pm, Sat 7.30am-6pm, Sun 9am-3pm (opening times), please contact for details and times of individual sessions
